patterns: what should do after my vaccination?

responses:
1. Apply wet wash cloth over the area 
2. Exercise Your Arm 
3. Drink Plenty of fluids 
4. dress lightly.

patterns: what should I do if I have some covid symptoms?
Can I visit vaccination center if I have COVID-19 sympytoms?
responses: People with COVID-19, should wait to be vaccinated until they have recovered
Only people without covid are advised to get vaccinated

patterns: am I eligible to take vaccination?
When will the vaccine be available to me?
If I have underlying condition, can I get a COVID-19 vaccine?
responses:
Eligible for vaccination: 
1. above 50 years 
2. 16 years or older, if any chronical medical condition 
3. Frontline healthcare personnel 
4. Education and childcare personnel
